pkgmetadata.longdescription: Eigenvalues and Singular Values and Vectors from Large Matrices // R interface to PRIMME, a C library for computing a few eigenvalues and their corresponding eigenvectors of a real symmetric or complex Hermitian matrix. It can also compute singular values and vectors of a square or rectangular matrix. It can find largest, smallest, or interior singular/eigenvalues and can use preconditioning to accelerate convergence.
